text: Elymus villosus is a species of wild rye known by the common names silky wild rye, downy wild rye, or hairy wild rye. It is native to eastern North America. ==References == villosus Category:Bunchgrasses of North America Category:Grasses of the United States Category:Grasses of Canada Category:Native grasses of the Great Plains region Category:Flora of the United States Category:Flora of the Canadian Prairies Category:Flora of the Eastern United States Category:Flora of the Appalachian Mountains Category:Flora of the Great Lakes region (North America) Category:Plants described in 1809
title: Elymus villosus
